name: schwab-options-scanner-monorepo
description: Unified Schwab Options Scanner - Full Stack Application

scripts.start: concurrently "cd schwab-options-backend && npm start" "cd options-scanner && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd schwab-options-backend && npm run dev" "cd options-scanner && npm start"
scripts.install-all: cd schwab-options-backend && npm install && cd ../options-scanner && npm install
scripts.clean: cd schwab-options-backend && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../options-scanner && rm -rf node_modules

author: Your Name
